Instance.description: Interaction exclusively for collectibles where a Sim can click on a collectible and combine its states to create a new collectible inside its inventory.
Instance.parents: ObjectPickerInteraction, PickerSingleChoiceSuperInteraction, PickerSuperInteraction, ImmediateSuperInteraction, SuperInteraction, Interaction

TunableEnum.name: collection_type
TunableEnum.description: ID of collectible that can be selected.
